report.title: Associated species using standard filters
report.description: Gives a list of top n associated species for occurrences selected according to a standard filter, with their number of records. Ideal for populating a 'species cloud'.
report.query: SELECT COALESCE(default_common_name, preferred_taxon) as species, taxon_meaning_id, records, 24 - ((rank() OVER (ORDER BY records DESC))::float - 1) / count(*) * 15 as font_size FROM ( SELECT default_common_name, preferred_taxon, taxon_meaning_id, count(id) as records FROM (SELECT oassoc.id, oassoc.default_common_name, oassoc.preferred_taxon, oassoc.taxon_meaning_id FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN occurrence_associations oa on (oa.from_occurrence_id=o.id or oa.to_occurrence_id=o.id) and oa.deleted=false JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt on ctt.id=oa.association_type_id JOIN cache_occurrences oassoc on (oassoc.id=oa.to_occurrence_id and oa.from_occurrence_id=o.id) or (oassoc.id=oa.from_occurrence_id and oa.to_occurrence_id=o.id) #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #filters# ORDER BY id DESC ) list GROUP BY default_common_name, preferred_taxon, taxon_meaning_id ORDER BY count(id) DESC LIMIT #species_to_return# ) AS list GROUP BY COALESCE(default_common_name, preferred_taxon), taxon_meaning_id, records ORDER BY COALESCE(default_common_name, preferred_taxon) ASC
